Header: National Media Center rejects reports on another terrorist attack
Content: National Media Center says that some media organizations and individuals are carrying a false publicity by misinterpreting a statement issued by the US Embassy. Issuing a statement, the National Media Center said that the publicity stating that there is information about another terrorist attack, is completely false. The US Embassy issued a travel advisory for US citizens touring Sri Lanka on the 2nd of this month. The National Media Center states that the publicity given by certain media organizations and individuals, wrongly interpreting the statement saying that there will be another terrorist attack, is totally false. Issuing a twitter message, US Ambassador in Sri Lanka has said that the travel advisory issued on Sri Lanka is a usual announcement.
